typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_c0} as short,
		Filename_Translated as string,
		Filename_Original as string,
		FabGuard_Version as string,
		Run_Path_and_Name as string,
		Recipe_Path_and_Name as string,
		SensorID as string,
		Version as string,
		Acquired_with_Version as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Group as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_ID as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Description as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Area as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Type as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_FabGuard as short,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_ID as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_Description as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_Type as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_1_TDS_Type as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_1_TDS_Serial_Number as integer,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_1_TDS_Version as string,
		Substrate_Information_Lot_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Cassette_ID as short,
		Substrate_Information_Slot_ID as short,
		Substrate_Information_Substrate_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Part_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Layer_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Technology_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Substrate_Start_Time_local as timestamp,
		Substrate_Information_Substrate_Start_Time_GMT as timestamp,
		Process_Information_Operator_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Sequence_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Recipe_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Control_Job_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Process_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_1_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_2_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_3_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_4_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_5_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_6_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_7_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_8_ID as string,
		General_Info_Start_Time as string,
		General_Info_Start_Time_at_the_acquisition_location as timestamp,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_Path_and_Name as string,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_Revision as short,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_last_modified_by as string,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_last_modified_Time_local as timestamp,
		General_Info_Start_Time_at_the_acquisition_GMT as timestamp,
		General_Info_Run_Path_and_Name as string,
		General_Info_Duration_s as double,
		General_Info_Number_of_Data_Points as short,
		General_Info_Number_of_Scans as boolean,
		General_Info_Number_of_Bins as short,
		Bins as short,
		TimePoints as short,
		TimeRelativesec as double,
		TimeAbsoluteUTC as double,
		TimeAbsoluteDate_Time as string,
		Step as boolean,
		Status as boolean,
		Tool_Pres_CM_mTorr_SVID167813621 as short,
		Tool_Pwr_Bot_RF_Fwd_W_SVID167813623 as short,
		Tool_Pwr_Bot_RF_Refl_W_SVID167813625 as short,
		Tool_Pwr_Bot_RF_VPP_V_SVID167813627 as short,
		Tool_Pwr_Bot_RF_VDC_V_SVID167813629 as short,
		Tool_Gas_C4F8_Flow_sccm_SVID167813630 as double,
		Tool_Gas_C5F8_Flow_sccm_SVID167813631 as double,
		Tool_Gas_CO_Flow_sccm_SVID167813632 as double,
		Tool_Gas_Ar_Flow_sccm_SVID167813633 as double,
		Tool_Gas_O2_30_sccm_Flow_sccm_SVID167813634 as double,
		Tool_Gas_CHF3_Flow_sccm_SVID167813635 as double,
		Tool_Gas_CF4_Flow_sccm_SVID167813636 as double,
		Tool_Gas_O2_1_SLM_Flow_sccm_SVID167813637 as double,
		Tool_Temp_Elec_Top_degC_SVID167813638 as double,
		Tool_Temp_Wall_Side_degC_SVID167813639 as double,
		Tool_Temp_Elec_Bot_degC_SVID167813640 as double,
		Tool_He_Pres_Back_1_Torr_SVID167813641 as double,
		Tool_He_Pres_Back_2_Torr_SVID167813642 as double,
		Tool_He_Flow_1_sccm_SVID167813643 as double,
		Tool_He_Flow_2_sccm_SVID167813644 as double,
		Tool_ESC_Voltage_V_SVID167813645 as short,
		Tool_ESC_Current_uA_SVID167813646 as short,
		Tool_Pres_APC_Pos_deg_SVID167813647 as double,
		Tool_Gap_Dist_mm_SVID167813648 as double,
		Tool_Cap_C1_Bot_Pos_SVID167813651 as short,
		Tool_Cap_C2_Bot_Pos_SVID167813652 as short,
		Tool_Imped_R_Top_ohm_SVID167813653 as boolean,
		Tool_Imped_Jx_Top_ohm_SVID167813654 as boolean,
		Tool_Imped_R_Bot_ohm_SVID167813655 as boolean,
		Tool_Imped_Jx_Bot_ohm_SVID167813656 as boolean,
		Tool_Phase_SVID167813658 as short,
		Tool_Magnitude_SVID167813659 as short,
		{Tool_Rcp_Step_Num_SVID167813666_[Tool's_Step]} as short,
		Tool_Rcp_Step_Time_sec_SVID167813667 as double,
		Tool_Gas_CH2F2_Flow_sccm_SVID167813678 as double,
		Tool_Gas_N2_Flow_sccm_SVID167813679 as double,
		Tool_Gas_He_Flow_sccm_SVID167813680 as short,
		Tool_Gas_H2_Flow_sccm_SVID167813681 as double,
		Tool_Gas_CHF3_2_Flow as double,
		Tool_Bin_Polling_Latency as double,
		Tool_Bin_Data_Age as double,
		Tool_Bin_Data_Age_SECS as double,
		Sig_Bot_RF_On as boolean,
		Sig_Edge_He_Backside_Pressure_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Center_He_Backside_Pressure_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Center_He_Backside_Flow_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Edge_He_Backside_Flow_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Upper_Temperature_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Side_Temperature_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Lower_Temperature_RF_On as double,
		Sig_ElectroStatic_Chuck_Voltage_RF_On as double,
		Sig_ElectroStatic_Chuck_Current_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Chamber_Pressure_RF_On_Steady_State_post_Run as double,
		Sig_CH2F2_Flow_RF_On as double,
		Sig_Vpp_Arc_Counter_1450_W as double,
		{Sig_No_arc_=_0} as double,
		{Sig_Vpp_Arc_Counter_1200-1450_W} as double,
		Sig_Vpp_Arc_Counter_1450_W_v2_post_Run as double,
		Sig_Reflected_Power_of_Stady_State_post_Run as double,
		Sig_Filter_Acceptable_Data_Age as boolean,
		{Sig_Pwr_Bot_RF_Fwd_DevAvg_Steady_State_5-60} as double,
		{Sig_Gas_Ar_Steady_State_5-60_RF_On_post_Run} as double,
		{Sig_Gas_Ar_DevAvg_Steady_State_5-60_RF_On_post_Run} as double,
		Sig_VPP_TRIM_Step_4_post_Run as double,
		Sig_C4F8_TRIM_Step_4_post_Run as double,
		Sig_VPP_TRIM_Step_2_post_Run as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,'=','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'adls',
	folderPath: 'translated/examples/ETH.delta.df',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,'=','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
